attributes.action: All politicians to honestly answer important questions
attributes.additional_details:
I would like Westminster politicians to treat their constituents with respect and honestly provide answers to important questions.
We need to be treated as sensible adults and be included in debates around the future direction of the country. 
I believe we can be trusted with the truth and this will foster a deeper and wider understanding of the real issues we all face
attributes.background: I'm exasperated with media trained politicians selfishly delivering their pre-defined messages rather than honestly answering important questions and respecting voters.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see more honesty in politics, but it's not clear what you want the Government or Parliament to do to achieve this. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
